Contribution.definition: payment of a share of an amount for which one is liable

1.definition: payment of a share of an amount for which one is liable

sub_terms.a: shared payment of a judgment by joint tortfeasors esp. according to proportional fault compare
sub_terms.b: pro rata apportionment of loss among all the insurance policies covering the same person or property compare

2.definition: the money paid by one responsible for a share

3.definition: payment to a common fund (as by an employer or employee to an insurance plan or retirement fund)
